entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 10:28 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure: 96.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: NNW 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
